Arrow ducks the palm and steps right into Termitron's shots meant for Still=
er. He's hit by them in the back and goes down to one knee.

Burning Hammer=
 stares at Perplex is stasis lock while everyone yelled "save Trinity!" He =
shakes his head...

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: *Orchid* 
  To:=
 nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Thursday, July 12, 2001 6:08 PM
  Subject:=
 Re: Chivtrons under attack... again/Clash


  STILLER




  (Stiller is he=
adbutted in the face. He bends over some, wiping mech fluid from his face. =
Then he springs up, thrusting the palm of his hand upwards at Arrow's face.=
..)

    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: Soulstice Omega 
    To: n=
bwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
    Sent: Thursday, July 12, 2001 1:40 AM
    Subjec=
t: Re: Chivtrons under attack... again/Clash


    Arrow is hit but quickly=
 recovers and actually tries to headbutt Stiller...

essage -----

     =
 Sent: Wednesday, July 11, 2001 8:33 PM
      Subject: Re: Chivtrons under =
attack... again/Clash


      STILLER

swings a punch at Arrow's stomach...)

er attack... again/Clash

ht hook at his head...

tice Omega

y, July 08, 2001 11:17 PM
            Subject: Re: Chivtrons under attack..=
. again/Clash


            Arrow looks at Stiller and then at Burning Hamm=
er.

            Arrow: You take Perplex back inside.

            Burning =
Hammer nods and Arrow approaches Stiller...

              ----- Original M=
essage ----- 
              From: *Orchid* 
              To: nbwrpg@yahoog=
roups.com 
              Sent: Sunday, July 08, 2001 10:46 PM
             =
 Subject: Re: Chivtrons under attack... again/Clash


              STILLER=





              (Stiller's smile grow larger as he waits for Arrow...)

=

ce Omega

                Sent:=
 Sunday, July 08, 2001 1:21 AM
                Subject: Re: Chivtrons under=
 attack... again/Clash


                Arrow approaches Stiller, looking =
very angry...

                  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
       =
           Sent: Saturday, July 07, 2001 8:05 PM
                  Subject:=
 Re: Chivtrons under attack... again/Clash


                  STILLER




=

                  (Stiller smiles and puts his crossbow in it's holster. H=
e clutches his fists and stares at Arrow.. He wanted a fist fight. Stiller =
motions for Arrow to come...)

                    ----- Original Message -=
---- 
                    From: Soulstice Omega 
                    To: nb=
wrpg@yahoogroups.com 
                    Sent: Saturday, July 07, 2001 6:2=
9 PM
                    Subject: Re: Chivtrons under attack... again/Clash=



                    Arrow ducks the arrow (heehee) and fires back 7 shot=
s at Stiller...

                      ----- Original Message ----- 
      =
                From: *Orchid* 
                      To: nbwrpg@yahoogroup=
s.com 
                      Sent: Saturday, July 07, 2001 5:17 AM
        =
              Subject: Re: Chivtrons under attack... again/Clash


        =
              MCGOWAN / BARRYMORE / STILLER / ALBA / VIRGO / LEE / DEPP



=


                      (McGowan jumps over the 2 energy balls and fires a =
missile at Nightlight.)



                      (Barrymore takes one of th=
e energy balls to the chest but dodges the other with a side jump. She fire=
s 6 laser beams at Nightlight.)



                      (Depp is struck by=
 both energy balls, taking them in the left shoulder. Depp fires 7 shots at=
 Nightlight.)



                      (Alba ducks the energy balls and pul=
ls a pin from a grenade and throws it in front of the Chivtron base.)



  =
                    (Stiller growls and fires an arrow at Arrow.)



      =
                (Lee fires a ball of fire at Nightlight's legs, attempting =
to trip her up.)



                      (Virgo fires a red energy drainin=
g dart at Nightlight...)

                        Nightlight::

                    =
    Nightlight tried to defend herself, and dificulty she could avoid the 
=
                        attacks of McGowan and Stronghold, She fired 2 ener=
gy balls to 
                        McGowan, 2 against Barrymore, 2 agaisn=
t Alba, 2 against Depp, 2 
                        against Airbomber, 2 aga=
isnt Stranato and 2 against Stronghold. But 
                        she wa=
s hit by the combined attack of Barrymore and Stranato, doing 
            =
            her fell. 

                        She felt stunned and she wo=
uld be defendless a short while.
